Address.label: Address
Address.value: 12300 GRANT STREET, THORNTON, Colorado, 80241-3120, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: is engaged in the manufacturing, developing marketing, and commercializing Copper-Indium-Gallium-diSelenide (CIGS) photovoltaic (PV) products. The company is integrating its products into the markets such as aerospace, defense, emergency management, and consumer/OEM applications. Ascent is also working to expand its outdoor solar chargers, such as the XD-12 and the XD-48. The company markets and sells its products through OEMs, system integrators, distributors, retailers, and e-commerce companies.
